name: ReTreat
description:
Use W, A, and D to control the character.

Candy pick ups add more candy to your current count, and Lollipops multiply the amount of candy you receive by 3 for 10 seconds. Enemy ghosts follow and deduct candy if they touch the character.

Design - Samuel Edwards, Lily Nghi

Programming - Lily Nghi, Caelen Perkins

2D Art - Caelen Perkins, Adriana Aguila

3D Art - Catie Boyle, Joseph Denike

Voice Acting - Caelen Perkins, Catie Boyle

Music by Bensound - www.bensound.com

Help from the GameDev Knights :D
